channel.title: Ignore this thread pls, ty
channel.description:
Ignore this thread
I will never have anywhere near the WiM or time necessary to make a sequel in this series happen (also if geyde says that this setup format is unsalvageable, im partial to believe him on that)
Hopefully the first one was enjoyed by ppl; co-designing and co-hosting that was my dream for the longest time, and it got to happen, so yay

item.title: Ignore this thread pls, ty
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
I like the flavor, but idk if I got the heart to do like 3 more setups on fire emblem alone. I got other plans for mashes, plus saying no to FE16 mash is sad. As it has the most potential for multiball

Read full topic

But you’ll need to specify things such as what level of power things should have
